name: Balsamic Chicken with Red Onions and Potatoes
author: stmwood
summary: Easy chicken dish that is bound to impress your family and friends!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or more to taste
2 whole split chicken breasts with skin
kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 large red onion, cut into wedges
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Pour 1 tablespoon oil into a baking dish
Arrange potato slices in the bottom of the dish
Mix parsley and garlic together in a small bowl
Season underside of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper
Loosen skin and push parsley and garlic mixture underneath
Place chicken on top of potatoes in the dish
Drizzle remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and balsamic vinegar over chicken
Bake in the preheated oven, basting occasionally with juices, until an instant-read thermometers inserted into the center reads 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 30 minutes
